title: Mansion Global Daily: Australian Islands, Buying Dubai and More

The country’s stunning coastline has a range for sale. Read More

THE INSIDERS

Design Firm Chief Says Luxury is About Tapping Into All the Senses

Jordan Rogove, of New York’s DXA Studio, says authenticity is key to a truly high-end home. Read More

NEWS BITES

New York’s Luxury Market Softens With One in Four New Properties Unsold Since 2013, 16,200 condo units in 682 buildings finished construction in New York City, yet 4,100—most of them in luxury buildings—remain unsold, according to data compiled by StreetEasy. There are currently thousands of new units under construction in New York and developers may be nearing a turning point amid changing tax laws, the upcoming presidential election and fear of a recession. The Business Times

Zillow Plans To Launch New Homebuying Platform in 26 Cities by 2020 The online real estate listing platform Zillow plans to expand Zillow Offers, a new branch of the company’s iBuying arm, to allow homebuyers who purchase new construction from homebuilding partners to sell their home directly through the platform. Zillow Offers is now available only in select cities but is expected to be in more than 26 major cities by mid-2020. MarketWatch

U.S. Pre-Owned Home Sales Reach Highest Rate in Over a Year Sales of previously owned U.S. homes rose 1.3% month-over-month in August to the highest rate in over a year, according to the National Association of Realtors. The increase is attributed to higher incomes and lower mortgage rates. Median home sale prices also rose year-over-year by 4.7% in August to $278,200. South China Morning Post

Renting and Buying in Dubai Expected to Get More Affordable as Supply Increases As supply of residential properties in Dubai is expected to grow over the next year, rent and sale prices are expected to fall, according to Core Research. Almost 29,500 new units are set to be completed this year, which should result in a tenant and buyer-friendly market. The government is taking steps to slow supply through its new real estate committee. The National

description: Mansion Global’s daily round-up of the latest luxury real estate news from around the world
